text: When women are depressed, they eat or go shopping. Men invade another country. It's a whole different way of thinking.
author: Elayne Boosler

text: There are but very few men clever enough to know all the mischief they do.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

text: The production of children, the nurture of those born, and the daily life of men, of these matters woman is visibly the cause.
author: Guru Nanak

text: Being a woman is a terribly difficult task, since it consists principally in dealing with men.
author: Joseph Conrad

text: A good part - and definitely the most fun part - of being a feminist is about frightening men.
author: Julie Burchill
